{{Infobox battle item |name = Spell Tag |image = [[File:Spell Tag.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Spell Tag''. |location =
*[[Spell Tag#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Spell Tag''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Ghost_Type_icon.png|30px]] Ghost type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Mt Silver|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Old Chateau|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Lost Hotel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Memorial Hill|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
